name: Cardside Place
description:
Play alone against the computer while expanding your collection. Inspired by Triple Triad, the winner is the player who lays out the most of his cards in any number of rounds and matches.

The game is not a simple clone, but comes with new ideas and will be expanded by several more. Especially a multiplayer, so that the matches can be played with friends.

You are welcome to contribute your ideas. Everything I can implement will get a place in my feature wish list. Just look for the communitiy entries at the end of this site.

WARNING

This game contains mathematical content and therefore requires calculation skills of the player. A simpler paper-scissors-bricks alternative is fortunately already in planning.


FEATURES

Collect new cards

Ghosts, Elements, Healer, Mirror, Poison, Kohai & Senpai - all have their very own abilities, which complement the default cards and can turn the action on the board in any way.

Different abilities

Different types of cards provide tactical variety and different ways to defeat your opponent with the last card or just to get an advantage.

Direct and indirect attacks

Attack and defend with the highest possible card values. But beware, the indirect attacks such as Plus and Same can render even your most powerful stats useless.

Customiziation

Create your own game rules in the options and design the matches according to your needs.

PLANNED FEATURES

new platforms

  • Android, MacOSX, Linux Ubuntu, XBox

new cards

  • More Cards: More cards with new pictures, values and abilities.

new abilities

  • Stunt Double: Before each turn you can choose which friendly card on the field to swap with when attacked.
  • Wall Values: Use the wall values for Plus and Same rule. Mirror cards copy adjacent wall values when laying out.

new modes

  • Multiplayer: Play against a friend.
  • Card Trading: Players can trade cards with each other.
  • Card Creator: Players can create their own cards.
  • Card Store: Creator/Artists can sell their own cards.
  • Tutorial: ingame explanations of the game rules.
  • Tournaments: Various presets with all game and card trading rules.

new options

  • Open/Hidden: Cards of both players are visible to each other, or not.
  • Attack Mode: Player can configure default attack style - for example only 1 card value, or paper-scissors-stone, or something custom.
  • Field Elements: Fields get random elements that influence element cards.
  • Defense: Cards that defend successfully and have a special property apply it to the attacker when defending - for example, Poison, Healer, and Element cards.
  • 4x4, 5x5, 6x6 Field: More than 6 cards in hand and to place on the playing field.
  • 3D-Field: The playing field is stacked and the cards get two more values for top and bottom. It will be attacked in 6 directions.

new graphics

  • Backgrounds: Say goodbye to the black screen in the background and welcome scenes that matches to Cardside Place - a peacefull place where gamer come together and just want to play cards.
  • UI: Other buttons, menu and HUD elements.
  • Card Pictures: Finished shading and added backgrounds.
  • Animations: Different animations to visualize the different card effects and just make it look more alive.

new sounds

  • Music: More music for more variety and suitable for different playing fields.

RULES

Attack: Each card attacks with its four side values. Depending on the other rules, there are additional conditions.

Plus: If at least two sums give the same value, the opponent's card is attacked indirectly and all its values increase by 1.
see details here

Same: If at least two values are the same, the opponent's card is attacked indirectly and all its values increase by 1.

Ghosts: Can only be attacked directly by other ghosts.

Elements: Always attack each other except Wind, which is immune to all other elements.

Healer: Heals what it does not attack and resets card values to their origin.

Mirror: Copies the values of adjacent cards when played.

Poison: Poisons what it attacks, decreases card values per turn.

Senpai: Increases the stats of attacked Kohai cards. Learns to add per turn, 2 random values in hand, 1 random value on field.

Kohai: Connects to attacked Senpai cards, allowing chain attacks for all other attackers. Learns to add per turn, 2 random values in hand, 1 random value on field.

CONTROLS

  • mainly use the mouse and left click
  • use the keyboard to change the player name
